sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The UK Ministry of Defense reported that satellite imagery shows that Russian forces have constructed firing defense positions on the roofs of several reactor buildings at the Zaporizhia nuclear power plant, the largest in Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Russia has controlled it since March 2022 however this is the first indication of the actual reactor buildings being integrated in tactical defense planning Russia has likely constructed these positions because it is increasingly concerned about the prospects of a major Ukrainian counter-offensive the move highly likely increases the chances of damage to the safety systems if fighting takes place around the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant. However, direct catastrophic damage to the reactors is unlikely under most plausible scenarios involving infantry weapons because the structures are very heavily reinforced.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: La réserve fédérale américaine a reconnu ce vendredi que des ratés dans son organisme de supervision avaient joué dans la faillite de la Silicon Valley Bank.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Soulignant que l'établissement financier a été incapable de gérer ces risques, la Fed a reconnu ne pas avoir pris les décisions appropriées une fois ces risques connus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: La faillite de la Silicon Valley Bank a fait trembler le système bancaire des Etats-Unis pendant plusieurs semaines et continue d'avoir des répercussions.
